fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.requests.interfaces

Interface ProcessingNodeI


  • public interface ProcessingNodeI
    The interface ProcessingNodeI declares methods for an object that will bridge the gap between the request language interpreter and the underlying sensor node that executes a request in order to make the former access information and cooperate with the latter.

    Description

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-12-19

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<NodeInfoI> getNeighbours()
      return the set of neighbours node information of the processing sensor node.
      java.lang.String getNodeIdentifier()
      return the identifier of the current node.
      PositionI getPosition()
      return the position of the processing sensor node.
      SensorDataI getSensorData(java.lang.String sensorIdentifier)
      return the current sensor data from the requested sensor of the processing sensor node or null if no such sensor exists.
      QueryResultI propagateRequest(java.lang.String nodeIdentifier, RequestContinuationI requestContinuation)
      propagate the current request in its current execution state to the neighbour nodeIdentifier and return the result of this propagation call.
      void propagateRequestAsync(java.lang.String nodeIdentifier, RequestContinuationI requestContinuation)
      propagate the current request in its current execution state to the neighbour nodeIdentifier and return the result of this propagation call.

      • getSensorData

        SensorDataI getSensorData(java.lang.String sensorIdentifier)
        return the current sensor data from the requested sensor of the processing sensor node or null if no such sensor exists.

        Contract

         pre     sensorIdentifier != null && !sensorIdentifier.isEmpty()
 post    return != null
        Parameters:
        sensorIdentifier - a sensor identifier.
        Returns:
        the current sensor data from the requested sensor.

      • propagateRequest

        QueryResultI propagateRequest(java.lang.String nodeIdentifier,
                              RequestContinuationI requestContinuation)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        propagate the current request in its current execution state to the neighbour nodeIdentifier and return the result of this propagation call.

        Contract

         pre     nodeIdentifier != null && !nodeIdentifier.isEmpty()
 pre     requestContinuation != null
 post    return != null
        Parameters:
        nodeIdentifier - identifier of a neighbour of the processing sensor node.
        requestContinuation - continuation of the request.
        Returns:
        the result of the request called on nodeIdentifier.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

      • propagateRequestAsync

        void propagateRequestAsync(java.lang.String nodeIdentifier,
                           RequestContinuationI requestContinuation)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        propagate the current request in its current execution state to the neighbour nodeIdentifier and return the result of this propagation call.

        Contract

         pre     nodeIdentifier != null && !nodeIdentifier.isEmpty()
 pre     requestContinuation != null && requestContinuation.isAsynchronous()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        nodeIdentifier - identifier of a neighbour of the processing sensor node.
        requestContinuation - continuation of the request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
